```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
library(ggpubr)

coords <- read.csv("river_coordinates.csv")
str(coords)
```

#### Map of electrofishing sites

```{r Site Map, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

# years,
# density,
# biomass,
# reference
leaflet()%>% 
   setView(lng = -55.28,lat=48.99,zoom=7)%>% 
   addTiles() %>%
   addCircleMarkers(data=distinct(coords, river_code,	
                                  river_name,	
                                  lat,	
                                  long,
                                  density,
                                  biomass
   ), 
   popup = ~paste0(
      "Code: ", river_code,
      "<br>Name: ", river_name,
      "<br>Lat: ", lat,
      "<br>Long: ", long,
      "<br>Density: ", density,
      "<br>Biomass: ", biomass
   ), 
   radius = 6, 
   color = 'black', 
   fillColor = 'blue', 
   stroke = TRUE, 
   weight = 1, 
   fillOpacity = 0.5)
```
